title: President Rajapaksa arrives in Moscow
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix By: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived at Vinukoa International Airport in Moscow today (6th February) for three day official visit to Russian Federation. This afternoon President Rajapaksa will be awarded an Honorary Doctorate by the People’s Friendship University of Russian Federation (PFU), formally known as Patricia…
